Name: Ordeal
About the game: Ordeal is a third-person shooter with a WWII setting and a Low Poly style. The game will be divided into companies - the USSR, America, Great Britain, France, Poland and Germany, each company has its own set of missions over the years, corresponding to the chronology of the events of World War II. The player will be able to take part in various events of the Second World War.
